name: Mind Genius Charitable Trust
briefDescription: Mission  Ignite: How do we bridge the divide between rich-poor, urban-rural, literate-illiterate? How do we ensure equal opportunities to every person in our country? How do we establish a link in the minds of our youth â€“ one who dreams of a foreign degree, and another who dreams for 2 hours of electricity to study each evening?                                                                                                                                               Unite: How can we bridge this gap? How do we bring these two worlds closer? How can we achieve this target in least possible time? By working together.
